*R/core_jobj.R*

## print_jobj

## Description
Generic method for print jobj for a connection type 


## Usage
```r
print_jobj(sc, jobj, ...) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| sc | `spark_connection` (used for type dispatch) |
| jobj | Object to print |
